XIsf_WriteParam Struct Reference

#include <xilisf.h>


Data Fields

u32 Address
u8 * WritePtr
u32 NumBytes

Detailed Description

The following structure definition specifies the operational parameters to be passed to the XIsf_Write API while performing Normal write (XISF_WRITE) and OTP write (XISF_OTP_WRITE) operations.

Field Documentation

u32 XIsf_WriteParam::Address
 

Address in the Serial Flash

u32 XIsf_WriteParam::NumBytes
 

Number of bytes to be written to the Serial Flash

u8* XIsf_WriteParam::WritePtr
 

Pointer to the data to be written to the Serial Flash
